dev.nokee.platform.base

Interface DependencyAwareComponent<T extends ComponentDependencies>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the component dependencies
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CApplication, CApplicationExtension, CLibrary, CLibraryExtension, CppApplication, CppApplicationExtension, CppLibrary, CppLibraryExtension, IosApplication, JavaNativeInterfaceLibrary, JniLibrary, JniLibraryExtension, NativeApplication, NativeApplicationExtension, NativeLibrary, NativeLibraryExtension, NativeTestSuite, ObjectiveCApplication, ObjectiveCApplicationExtension, ObjectiveCIosApplication, ObjectiveCIosApplicationExtension, ObjectiveCLibrary, ObjectiveCLibraryExtension, ObjectiveCppApplication, ObjectiveCppApplicationExtension, ObjectiveCppLibrary, ObjectiveCppLibraryExtension, SwiftApplication, SwiftApplicationExtension, SwiftIosApplication, SwiftIosApplicationExtension, SwiftLibrary, SwiftLibraryExtension

    public interface DependencyAwareComponent<T extends ComponentDependencies>
    A component with dependency buckets.
    Since:
    0.4
